name: Five Nights at Wario's
description:
Check the sequel of FNAW

⬇️⬇️⬇️

https://wwwwario-official.itch.io/fnaw-2

*EXTRACT THE FILE FROM THE .ZIP FILE IN ORDER FOR SAVING TO WORK*  Whahaha!....whaha...wha...wh...w...  This is the first game in the series, which has now gotten an update. All five mainline games are getting updates, which adds new features and fixes bugs. All five updated games will together give you access to a cross-game Easter Egg. Check the other game pages to see if their updated versions are available yet.  The updated version of Five Nights at Wario's 1 contains:  -Custom Night  -Achievements  -Tons of bug fixes  -Several improvements  -Easter Eggs  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------  Join the FNAW Discord HERE: https://discord.gg/4Zw7K3a  Five Nights At Wario's is a parody game of Scott Cawthon's success Five Nights at Freddy's.  There once was a man named Wario, who worked alongside Waluigi in Wario's own fast food factory. After the two men along a few others go missing and the factory is rumored to be cursed, the factory closes for a while... until it's reopened. But underneath it all, there might be something much bigger hiding underneath.  This is built from scratch by me, with edited pictures from Google and models from Brawl Box (SSBB hacking tool).  Hope you like it! Big thanks to Scott Cawthton for making such an excelent franchise!
